content: If you're online, use Send Later from the File menu on the composition window, or Ctrl+Shift+Enter. This will place the message in the Outbox. When you wish to send the message(s) in Outbox, select Send Unsent Messages from the File menu on the main window, or the Outbox context menu. No need to switch between online and offline.
creator: sfhowes

content:
Suggestion: Add this option to those at the top of the composition screen: Save, Send, Spelling, Contacts at the very least as a pull down option under send. If this is the adopted fix, send should still default to send now.

Just a thought.

content:
Proces migrácie 32-bitovej inštalácie Thunderbirdu na 64-bitovú v systéme Windows je jednoduchý. 1. Stiahnite si 64-bitový inštalátor 2. Vypnite Thunderbird 3. Spustite 64-bitový inštalátor a Thunderbird sa postará o zvyšok.

o nič neprídete.

Omnia Energy 3 ha detto
non riesco più a ricevere o inviare email dal mio account . mi da un errore al momento dell'invio della mail: "Invio del messaggio non riuscito. Non è stata trovata una valida licenza." come posso risolvere il problema?
creator: omniaenergyfv

content: Se il server ti rifiuta la connessione, non c'è nulla che tu possa fare da Thunderbird. Devi rivolgerti al gestore della tua casella per chiedere informazioni su eventuali variazioni di configurazione o problemi.

creator: @next

content: If you read the URL that is linked to in that email, there is a concise section devoted expressly to Thunderbird users.
creator: davidsk

content: Did you visit that URL? Your email provider is asking that you set authentication for Thunderbird to prove you are a customer of their services. It might be that you have no password or security setting in your SMTP server setup.
creator: davidsk
